parts.value: John had never been to such a fantastic restaurant.

answers: Never had John been to such a fantastic restaurant.

parts.value: I in no way want to be associated with this project.

answers: In no way do I want to be associated with this project.

parts.value: They had no sooner eaten dinner than the ceiling crashed onto the dining table.

answers: No sooner had they eaten dinner than the ceiling crashed onto the dining table.

parts.value: I had scarcely finished writing my essay when the examiner announced the end of the exam.

answers: Scarcely had I finished writing my essay when the examiner announced the end of the exam.

parts.value: I seldom leave my house so early.

answers: Seldom do I leave my house so early.

parts.value: People rarely appreciate this musician's talent.

answers: Rarely do people appreciate this musician's talent.

parts.value: We would understand what had happened that night only later.

answers: Only later would we understand what had happened that night.

parts.value: They had met such rude people nowhere before.

answers: Nowhere had they met such rude people before.

parts.value: He understood little about the situation.

answers: Little did he understand about the situation.

parts.value: The children should on no account go on their own.

answers: On no account should the children go on their own.
